briefTitle: MGR001 / Advair Diskus Local Equivalence Study in Asthma
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Double Dummy, Parallel Group Study to Determine the Local Equivalence of Multiple Doses of MGR001 to Advair Diskus Administered Via Oral Inhalation in Adult Asthma Patients

interventions.name: MGR001 (Fixed dose combination of Fluticasone propionate and salmeterol xinafoate)
Advair (Fixed dose combination of Fluticasone propionate and salmeterol xinafoate)

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether MGR001 is equivalent to Advair Diskus when administered by inhalation in adult asthma patients

primaryOutcome.measure: Forced Exhaled Volume in 1 Sec (FEV1) Area Under the Effect Curve on Day 1 (Assay Sensitivity)
